snippet.title: Cantata | Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
The defining Grand Tactics game, Cantata, tasks you with fighting turn-based battles across hand-crafted story missions and fully-moddable maps. Explore, expand, and endure across a campaign set on a mysterious planet or get creative and craft your own scenarios.

Buy Cantata on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/690370/Cantata/

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/cantatagame
Join our newsletter: https://bit.ly/3txnrV0
Get in the community on Discord: https://discord.gg/Wk98uxMZQC
